Lula upset by lack of clear goals in Brazil's new industry plan, sources sayBrazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva was displeased by a new industrial development plan announced on Monday by the government and told ministers it lacked clear targets, said two people familiar with the matter. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 00:14:50 GMT GYXSNWUGQJO73LGFUI3OOXPCMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/lula-upset-by-lack-clear-goals-brazils-new-industry-plan-sources-say-2024-01-24/Lisandra Paraguassu世界美洲
UK's Cameron to raise concerns over Gaza death toll on Israel visitBritish Foreign Secretary David Cameron will travel to Israel on Wednesday where he is expected to raise concerns over the high number of Palestinians killed and push for a "sustainable" ceasefire in the Gaza war. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 00:07:37 GMT 7BAUWXAYGZMEHP6MWONICWC73Y https://www.reuters.com/world/uks-cameron-raise-concerns-over-gaza-death-toll-israel-visit-2024-01-24/Reuters世界
AI rise will lead to increase in cyberattacks, GCHQ warnsThe rapid development of novel Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools will lead to an increase in cyberattacks and lower the barrier of entry for less sophisticated hackers to do digital harm, Britain’s GCHQ spy agency warned on Wednesday. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 00:05:03 GMT UPUDVLUMPRI33LHFZUX5RVEHUU https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/ai-rise-will-lead-increase-cyberattacks-gchq-warns-2024-01-24/James Pearson技术网络安全
Thai court to decide former PM hopeful's fate in election caseA Thai court will on Wednesday rule on whether former prime ministerial hopeful Pita Limjaroenrat broke the rules of a 2023 election won by his party, the first of two cases targeting an opposition that has threatened radical reforms to the country. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 00:03:36 GMT ON4YGDBT7NOVLG35F2FDZV6J3I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thai-court-decide-former-pm-hopefuls-fate-election-case-2024-01-24/Panu Wongcha-Um, Panarat Thepgumpanat世界亚太地区
UK issues statement from 24 nations on strikes on Yemen's HouthisBritain said in a joint statement on Tuesday that 24 countries, including the United States, Germany and Australia, conducted additional strikes on Monday against eight targets in Houthi-controlled areas of Yemen. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 23:00:21 GMT UROWRMQVIJNXTBSUBMWO3BMZMY https://www.reuters.com/world/uk-issues-statement-24-nations-strikes-yemens-houthis-2024-01-23/Reuters世界
U.S. lawmakers arrive in Taiwan in post-election show of supportThe leaders of the U.S. House of Representatives Taiwan Caucus, Republican Representative Mario Diaz Balart and Democratic Representative Ami Bera, have arrived in Taipei, their offices said on Tuesday, in a show of support after the island's election. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 22:57:43 GMT QXWT2MLXDFJOLC6ETTIBW5LL7I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-lawmakers-arrive-taiwan-post-election-show-support-2024-01-23/Patricia Zengerle世界亚太地区
US strikes targets in Iraq after forces woundedThe United States carried out strikes in Iraq against three facilities linked to Iran-backed militia on Tuesday, the Pentagon said, after a weekend attack on an Iraqi air base that wounded U.S. forces. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 22:07:22 GMT F5XWOZEDQBKSBAIOHIS6ADDTM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-strikes-targets-iraq-after-us-forces-wounded-officials-2024-01-23/Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart, Timour Azhari世界
Exclusive: One-month Gaza truce focus of intensive talks, sources sayIsrael and Hamas broadly agree in principle that an exchange of Israeli hostages for Palestinian prisoners could take place during a month-long ceasefire, but the framework plan is being held up by the two sides' differences over how to bring a permanent end to the Gaza war, three sources said. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:42:36 GMT J6QJKGJ66RKMPKUOLTJPSEIUIM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/one-month-gaza-truce-focus-intense-talks-sources-say-2024-01-23/ Andrew Mills, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Ahmed Mohamed Hassan, Dan Williams世界中东
Magnitude 5.67 aftershock strikes Kyrgyzstan-Xinjiang borderAn earthquake of magnitude 5.67 struck the Kyrgyzstan-Xinjiang border region on Wednesday, just a day after a magnitude 7.1 quake in the same area, the German Research Center for Geosciences (GFZ) said. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:23:04 GMT GSKJ4WSHZBM6ZKN7GEYMZVYZUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/magnitude-567-aftershock-strikes-kyrgyzstan-xinjiang-border-2024-01-23/Reuters世界亚太地区
US determined to remain strong security partner for Nigeria -BlinkenSecretary of State Antony Blinken on Tuesday said the United States is determined to remain a strong security partner for Nigeria, whose military is backed by the U.S., Britain and other allies in a long war against Islamist insurgents. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:17:15 GMT PU36RRRMQ5L27BIKMQM6J4X7UE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-dependent-remain-strong-security-partner-nigeria-blinken-2024-01-23/Reuters世界
Haiti's gang wars death toll doubles to nearly 5,000 in a year -UNThe number of people reported killed as Haiti faces a worsening conflict between heavily armed gangs increased by more than 110% last year to reach 4,789, United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said in a report published on Tuesday. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 20:12:06 GMT ELSSN7Y3IVPJ7IQKWFD42FCCFE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/haitis-gang-wars-death-toll-doubles-nearly-5000-year-un-2024-01-23/Reuters世界美洲
